bio: A Yo-kai that is always loitering about. He doesn't even know where he is going.

soultimate.name: Wringing Wander
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drops foe's Attack by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' attack power for a time.

skill.effect: Increases amount of HP absorbed by 100%.
skill.name: Grip on You

name: Loiter
